noopener">/wiki/Jumbo_Jet</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Jumbo Jet</span>"&gt;</span>Jumbo Jet<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="167"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The application of steam-powered cast iron blowing cylinders for providing pressurized air for <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blast_furnace" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Blast_furnace</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Blast furnace</span>"&gt;</span>blast furnaces<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> lead to a large increase in iron production in the late 18th century.  The higher furnace temperatures made possible with steam-powered blast allowed for the use of more lime in <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blast_furnace" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Blast_furnace</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Blast furnace</span>"&gt;</span>blast furnaces<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, which enabled the transition from charcoal to <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coke_(fuel)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Coke_(fuel)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Coke (fuel)</span>"&gt;</span>coke<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-54</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-54" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-54</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;54&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> These innovations lowered the cost of iron, making <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wagonway" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wagonway</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wagonway</span>"&gt;</span>horse railways<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and iron bridges practical.  The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puddling_(metallurgy)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Puddling_(metallurgy)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Puddling (metallurgy)</span>"&gt;</span>puddling process<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, patented by <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Cort" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Henry_Cort</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Henry Cort</span>"&gt;</span>Henry Cort<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in 1784 produced large scale quantities of wrought iron.  <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hot_blast" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Hot_blast</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Hot blast</span>"&gt;</span>Hot blast<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, patented by <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Beaumont_Neilson" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/James_Beaumont_Neilson</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">James Beaumont Neilson</span>"&gt;</span>James Beaumont Neilson<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in 1828, greatly lowered the amount of fuel needed to smelt iron.  With the development of the high pressure steam engine, the power to weight ratio of steam engines made practical steamboats and locomotives possible.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-55</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-55" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-55</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;55&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> New steel making processes, such as the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bessemer_process" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Bessemer_process</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Bessemer process</span>"&gt;</span>Bessemer process<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and the open hearth furnace, ushered in an area of heavy engineering in the late 19th century.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="168"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>One of the most famous engineers of the mid 19th century was <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Isambard_Kingdom_Brunel</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Isambard Kingdom Brunel</span>"&gt;</span>Isambard Kingdom Brunel<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, who built railroads, dockyards and steamships.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="169"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="170"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumb tright</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumbinner</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">style</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">width:172px;</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">image</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;img <span class="html-attribute-name">alt</span>="" <span //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/ba/Gulf_Offshore_Platform.jpg/340px-Gulf_Offshore_Platform.jpg 2x</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">data-file-width</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">1536</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">data-file-height</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">2048</span>" /&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>  <span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumbcaption</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">magnify</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Gulf_Offshore_Platform.jpg" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/File:Gulf_Offshore_Platform.jpg</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">internal</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Enlarge</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span>Offshore platform, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gulf_of_Mexico" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Gulf_of_Mexico</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Gulf of Mexico</span>"&gt;</span>Gulf of Mexico<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="171"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Industrial_Revolution" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Industrial_Revolution</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Industrial Revolution</span>"&gt;</span>Industrial Revolution<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> created a demand for machinery with metal parts, which led to the development of several <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine_tools" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Machine_tools</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Machine tools</span>"&gt;</span>machine tools<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. Boring cast iron cylinders with precision was not possible until <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Wilkinson_(industrialist)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/John_Wilkinson_(industrialist)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">John Wilkinson (industrialist)</span>"&gt;</span>John Wilkinson<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> invented his <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Wilkinson_(industrialist)#Boring_machine_for_steam_engines" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/John_Wilkinson_(industrialist)#Boring_machine_for_steam_engines</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">John Wilkinson (industrialist)</span>"&gt;</span>boring machine<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, which is considered the first <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine_tool" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Machine_tool</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Machine tool</span>"&gt;</span>machine tool<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-56</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-56" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-56</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;56&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> Other machine tools included the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Screw_cutting_lathe" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Screw_cutting_lathe</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Screw cutting lathe</span>"&gt;</span>screw cutting lathe<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milling_machine" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Milling_machine</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Milling machine</span>"&gt;</span>milling machine<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turret_lathe" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Turret_lathe</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Turret lathe</span>"&gt;</span>turret lathe<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Planer_(metalworking)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Planer_(metalworking)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Planer (metalworking)</span>"&gt;</span>metal planer<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.  Precision machining techniques were developed in the first half of the 19th century.  These included the use of gigs to guide the machining tool over the work and fixtures to hold the work in the proper position.  Machine tools and machining techniques capable of producing <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interchangeable_parts" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Interchangeable_parts</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Interchangeable parts</span>"&gt;</span>interchangeable parts<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> lead to <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mass_production" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Mass_production</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Mass production</span>"&gt;</span>large scale factory production<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> by the late 19th century.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-57</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-57" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-57</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;57&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="172"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The United States census of 1850 listed the occupation of "engineer" for the first time with a count of 2,000.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-58</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-58" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-58</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;58&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> There were fewer than 50 engineering graduates in the U.S. before 1865. In 1870 there were a dozen U.S. mechanical engineering graduates, with that number increasing to 43 per year in 1875.  In 1890, there were 6,000 engineers in civil, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mining" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Mining</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Mining</span>"&gt;</span>mining<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, mechanical and electrical.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-59</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-59" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-59</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;59&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="173"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>There was no chair of applied mechanism and applied mechanics at Cambridge until 1875, and no chair of engineering at Oxford until 1907.  Germany established technical universities earlier.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-60</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-60" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-60</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;60&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="174"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The foundations of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electrical_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electrical_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electrical engineering</span>"&gt;</span>electrical engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in the 1800s included the experiments of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alessandro_Volta" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Alessandro_Volta</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Alessandro Volta</span>"&gt;</span>Alessandro Volta<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Faraday" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Michael_Faraday</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Michael Faraday</span>"&gt;</span>Michael Faraday<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georg_Ohm" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Georg_Ohm</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Georg Ohm</span>"&gt;</span>Georg Ohm<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and others and the invention of the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electrical_telegraph" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electrical_telegraph</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electrical telegraph</span>"&gt;</span>electric telegraph<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in 1816 and the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electric_motor" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electric_motor</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electric motor</span>"&gt;</span>electric motor<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in 1872. The theoretical work of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Clerk_Maxwell" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/James_Clerk_Maxwell</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">James Clerk Maxwell</span>"&gt;</span>James Maxwell<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (see: <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maxwell%27s_equations" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Maxwell%27s_equations</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Maxwell&amp;#39;s equations</span>"&gt;</span>Maxwell's equations<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>) and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heinrich_Hertz" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Heinrich_Hertz</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Heinrich Hertz</span>"&gt;</span>Heinrich Hertz<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in the late 19th century gave rise to the field of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electronics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electronics</span>"&gt;</span>electronics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. The later inventions of the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacuum_tube" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Vacuum_tube</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Vacuum tube</span>"&gt;</span>vacuum tube<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transistor" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Transistor</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Transistor</span>"&gt;</span>transistor<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> further accelerated the development of electronics to such an extent that electrical and electronics engineers currently outnumber their colleagues of any other engineering specialty.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica_5-3</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;5&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="175"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Chemical_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Chemical engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Chemical engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> developed in the late nineteenth century.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica_5-4</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;5&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span>Early Career Development programː Britannica&amp;lt;/ref&amp;gt; Industrial scale manufacturing demanded new materials and new processes and by 1880 the need for large scale production of chemicals was such that a new industry was created, dedicated to the development and large scale manufacturing of chemicals in new industrial plants.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica_5-5</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;5&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> The role of the chemical engineer was the design of these chemical plants and processes.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica_5-6</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-ECPD_Definition_on_Britannica-5</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;5&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="176"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="177"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>  <span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumbcaption</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">magnify</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Four_solaire_001.jpg" rel="noreferrer class="html-attribute-value">Enlarge</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span>The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Odeillo_solar_furnace" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Odeillo_solar_furnace</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Odeillo solar furnace</span>"&gt;</span>solar furnace at Odeillo<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyr%C3%A9n%C3%A9es-Orientales" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Pyr%C3%A9n%C3%A9es-Orientales</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Pyrénées-Orientales</span>"&gt;</span>Pyrénées-Orientales<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/France</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">France</span>"&gt;</span>France<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> can reach temperatures up to 3,500&amp;#160;°C (6,330&amp;#160;°F)<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="178"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Aeronautical engineering deals with <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aircraft_design_process" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Aircraft_design_process</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Aircraft design process</span>"&gt;</span>aircraft design process<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> design while <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aerospace_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Aerospace_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Aerospace engineering</span>"&gt;</span>aerospace engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> is a more modern term that expands the reach of the discipline by including <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spacecraft" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Spacecraft</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Spacecraft</span>"&gt;</span>spacecraft<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> design. Its origins can be traced back to the aviation pioneers around the start of the 20th century although the work of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sir_George_Cayley" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Sir_George_Cayley</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Sir George Cayley</span>"&gt;</span>Sir George Cayley<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> has recently been dated as being from the last decade of the 18th century. Early knowledge of aeronautical engineering was largely empirical with some concepts and skills imported from other branches of engineering.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-americana_61-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-americana-61" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-americana-61</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;61&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="179"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The first <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doctor_of_Philosophy" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Doctor_of_Philosophy</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Doctor of Philosophy</span>"&gt;</span>PhD<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in engineering (technically, <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span>applied science and engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>) awarded in the United States went to <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josiah_Willard_Gibbs" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Josiah_Willard_Gibbs</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Josiah Willard Gibbs</span>"&gt;</span>Josiah Willard Gibbs<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> at <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yale_University" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Yale_University</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Yale University</span>"&gt;</span>Yale University<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in 1863; it was also the second PhD awarded in science in the U.S.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-62</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-62" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-62</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;62&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="180"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Only a decade after the successful flights by the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wright_brothers" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wright_brothers</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wright brothers</span>"&gt;</span>Wright brothers<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, there was extensive development of aeronautical engineering through development of military aircraft that were used in <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_I" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/World_War_I</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">World War I</span>"&gt;</span>World War I<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. Meanwhile, research to provide fundamental background science continued by combining <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theoretical_physics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Theoretical_physics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Theoretical physics</span>"&gt;</span>theoretical physics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> with experiments.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="181"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="182"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h2&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h2&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="183"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;link <span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="185"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineering is a broad discipline that is often broken down into several sub-disciplines. Although an engineer will usually be trained in a specific discipline, he or she may become multi-disciplined through experience. Engineering is often characterized as having four main branches:<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-63</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-63" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-63</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;63&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-UK_Council_64-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-UK_Council-64" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-UK_Council-64</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;64&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Ramchandani2000_65-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Ramchandani2000-65" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Ramchandani2000-65</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;65&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> chemical engineering, civil engineering, electrical engineering, and mechanical engineering.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="186"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="187"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Chemical_engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Chemical engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="188"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;link <span class="html-attribute-name">rel</span>="<span navigation-not-searchable</span>"&gt;</span>Main article: <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Chemical_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Chemical engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Chemical engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="189"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Chemical engineering is the application of physics, chemistry, biology, and engineering principles in order to carry out chemical processes on a commercial scale, such as the manufacture of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commodity_chemicals" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Commodity_chemicals</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Commodity chemicals</span>"&gt;</span>commodity chemicals<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Specialty_chemicals" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Specialty_chemicals</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Specialty chemicals</span>"&gt;</span>specialty chemicals<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oil_refinery" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Oil_refinery</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Oil refinery</span>"&gt;</span>petroleum refining<span class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Civil engineering is the design and construction of public and private works, such as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infrastructure" rel="noreferrer class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (airports, roads, railways, water supply, and treatment etc.), bridges, tunnels, dams, and buildings.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-66</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span sub-disciplines, including <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" class="line-number" value="206"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Bioengineering is the engineering of biological systems for a useful purpose. Examples of bioengineering research include bacteria engineered to produce chemicals, new medical imaging technology, portable and rapid disease diagnostic devices, prosthetics, biopharmaceuticals, and tissue-engineered organs.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="207"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philosophy_of_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Philosophy_of_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Philosophy of engineering</span>"&gt;</span>philosophy of engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="212"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="213"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h2&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Other_branches_of_engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Other branches of engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h2&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="214"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Aerospace_engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Aerospace engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="215"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;link <span class="html-attribute-name">rel</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-deduplicated-inline-style</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-resource-link" target="_blank" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="noreferrer noopener">mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096</a>"/&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">role</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">note</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">hatnote navigation-not-searchable</span>"&gt;</span>Main article: <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aerospace_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Aerospace_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Aerospace engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Aerospace engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="216"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Aerospace engineering studies design, manufacture aircraft, satellites, rockets, helicopters, and so on. It closely studies the pressure difference and aerodynamics of a vehicle to ensure safety and efficiency. Since most of the studies are related to fluids, it is applied to any moving vehicle, such as cars.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="217"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="218"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Marine_engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Marine engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="219"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;link <span class="html-attribute-name">rel</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-deduplicated-inline-style</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-resource-link" target="_blank" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="noreferrer noopener">mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096</a>"/&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">role</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">note</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">hatnote navigation-not-searchable</span>"&gt;</span>Main article: <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marine_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Marine_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Marine engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Marine engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="220"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Marine engineering is associated with anything on or near the ocean. Examples are, but not limited to, ships, submarines, oil rigs, structure, watercraft propulsion, on-board design and development, plants, harbors, and so on. It requires a combined knowledge in mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, civil engineering, and some programming abilities.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="221"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="222"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-attribute-value">Computer_engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Computer engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="223"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;link <span class="html-attribute-name">rel</span>="<span class="line-number" value="224"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Computer engineering (CE) is a branch of engineering that integrates several fields of computer science and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electronic_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electronic engineering</span>"&gt;</span>electronic engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>  required to develop <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_hardware" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Computer_hardware</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Computer hardware</span>"&gt;</span>computer hardware<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>  and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Software</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Software</span>"&gt;</span>software<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.  Computer engineers usually have training in electronic engineering (or <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electrical_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electrical_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electrical engineering</span>"&gt;</span>electrical engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>), <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_design" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Software_design</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Software design</span>"&gt;</span>software design<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, and hardware-software integration instead of only <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Software_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Software engineering</span>"&gt;</span>software engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>  or electronic engineering.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="225"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="226"></td><td class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Enlarge</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span>Design of a <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turbine" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Turbine</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Turbine</span>"&gt;</span>turbine<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> requires collaboration of engineers from many fields, as the system involves mechanical, electro-magnetic and chemical processes. The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turbine_blade" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Turbine_blade</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Turbine blade</span>"&gt;</span>blades<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stator" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Stator</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Stator</span>"&gt;</span>rotor and stator<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> as well as the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steam_cycle" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Steam_cycle</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Steam cycle</span>"&gt;</span>steam cycle<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> all need to be carefully designed and optimized.<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="233"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>In the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering_design" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Engineering_design</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Engineering design</span>"&gt;</span>engineering design<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> process, engineers apply mathematics and sciences such as physics to find novel solutions to problems or to improve existing solutions. Engineers need proficient knowledge of relevant sciences for their design projects. As a result, many engineers continue to learn new material throughout their careers.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="234"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>If multiple solutions exist, engineers weigh each design choice based on their merit and choose the solution that best matches the requirements. The task of the engineer is to identify, understand, and interpret the constraints on a design in order to yield a successful result. It is generally insufficient to build a technically successful product, rather, it must also meet further requirements.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="235"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Constraints may include available resources, physical, imaginative or technical limitations, flexibility for future modifications and additions, and other factors, such as requirements for cost, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Safety_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Safety_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Safety engineering</span>"&gt;</span>safety<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, marketability, productivity, and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serviceability_(computer)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Serviceability_(computer)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Serviceability (computer)</span>"&gt;</span>serviceability<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. By understanding the constraints, engineers derive <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Specifications" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Specifications</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Specifications</span>"&gt;</span>specifications<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> for the limits within which a viable object or system may be produced and operated.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="236"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="237"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span Engineering is applied to <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" class="html-attribute-value">Design</span>"&gt;</span>design<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, with emphasis on function and the utilization of mathematics and science.<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="239"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineers use their knowledge of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Science</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Science</span>"&gt;</span>science<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathematics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Mathematics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Mathematics</span>"&gt;</span>mathematics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logic" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Logic</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Logic</span>"&gt;</span>logic<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Economics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Economics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Economics</span>"&gt;</span>economics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Empirical_knowledge" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Empirical_knowledge</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Empirical knowledge</span>"&gt;</span>appropriate experience<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> or <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tacit_knowledge" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Tacit_knowledge</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Tacit knowledge</span>"&gt;</span>tacit knowledge<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> to find suitable solutions to a particular problem. Creating an appropriate <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathematical_model" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Mathematical_model</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Mathematical model</span>"&gt;</span>mathematical model<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> of a problem often allows them to analyze it (sometimes definitively), and to test potential solutions.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-72</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-72" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-72</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;72&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="240"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Usually, multiple reasonable solutions exist, so engineers must evaluate the different <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Design_choice" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Design_choice</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Design choice</span>"&gt;</span>design choices<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> on their merits and choose the solution that best meets their requirements. <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genrich_Altshuller" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Genrich_Altshuller</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Genrich Altshuller</span>"&gt;</span>Genrich Altshuller<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, after gathering statistics on a large number of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patent" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Patent</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Patent</span>"&gt;</span>patents<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, suggested that <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compromise" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Compromise</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Compromise</span>"&gt;</span>compromises<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> are at the heart of "<span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Level_of_invention" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Level_of_invention</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Level of invention</span>"&gt;</span>low-level<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>" engineering designs, while at a higher level the best design is one which eliminates the core contradiction causing the problem.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-73</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-73" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-73</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;73&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="241"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineers typically attempt to predict how well their designs will perform to their specifications prior to full-scale production. They use, among other things: <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prototype" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Prototype</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Prototype</span>"&gt;</span>prototypes<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scale_model" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Scale_model</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Scale model</span>"&gt;</span>scale models<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simulation" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Simulation</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Simulation</span>"&gt;</span>simulations<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Destructive_testing" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Destructive_testing</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Destructive testing</span>"&gt;</span>destructive tests<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nondestructive_testing" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Nondestructive_testing</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Nondestructive testing</span>"&gt;</span>nondestructive tests<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stress_testing" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Stress_testing</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Stress testing</span>"&gt;</span>stress tests<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. Testing ensures that products will perform as expected.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-74</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-74" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-74</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;74&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="242"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineers take on the responsibility of producing designs that will perform as well as expected and will not cause unintended harm to the public at large. Engineers typically include a <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Factor_of_safety" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Factor_of_safety</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Factor of safety</span>"&gt;</span>factor of safety<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in their designs to reduce the risk of unexpected failure.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="243"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The study of failed products is known as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forensic_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Forensic_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Forensic engineering</span>"&gt;</span>forensic engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and can help the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_design" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Product_design</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Product design</span>"&gt;</span>product designer<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in evaluating his or her design in the light of real conditions. The discipline is of greatest value after disasters, such as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridge_collapse" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Bridge_collapse</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Bridge collapse</span>"&gt;</span>bridge collapses<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, when careful analysis is needed to establish the cause or causes of the failure.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-75</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-75" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-75</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;75&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="244"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="245"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Computer_use</span>"&gt;</span>Computer use<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number"
