orbiter<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> during re-entry. Solutions to the flow require <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finite_element_method" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Finite_element_method</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Finite element method</span>"&gt;</span>modelling<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> of the combined effects of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Navier%E2%80%93Stokes_equations" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Navier%E2%80%93Stokes_equations</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Navier–Stokes equations</span>"&gt;</span>fluid flow<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heat_equation" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Heat_equation</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Heat equation</span>"&gt;</span>heat equations<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="247"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>As with all modern scientific and technological endeavors, computers and software play an increasingly important role. As well as the typical business <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Application_software" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Application_software</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Application software</span>"&gt;</span>application software<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> there are a number of computer aided applications (<span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_technologies" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Computer-aided_technologies</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Computer-aided technologies</span>"&gt;</span>computer-aided technologies<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>) specifically for engineering. Computers can be used to generate models of fundamental physical processes, which can be solved using <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Numerical_method" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Numerical_method</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Numerical method</span>"&gt;</span>numerical methods<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="248"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="249"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumb tright</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b9/WorldWideWebAroundWikipedia.png/580px-WorldWideWebAroundWikipedia.png 2x</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">data-file-width</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">1185</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">data-file-height</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">853</span>" /&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>  <span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumbcaption</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span noopener">/wiki/File:WorldWideWebAroundWikipedia.png</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">internal</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Enlarge</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span>Graphic representation of a minute fraction of the WWW, demonstrating <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hyperlink" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Hyperlink</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Hyperlink</span>"&gt;</span>hyperlinks<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="250"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>One of the most widely used <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Design_tool" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Design_tool</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Design tool</span>"&gt;</span>design tools<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in the profession is <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_design" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Computer-aided_design</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Computer-aided design</span>"&gt;</span>computer-aided design<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (CAD) software.  It enables engineers to create 3D models, 2D drawings, and schematics of their designs. CAD together with <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_mockup" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Digital_mockup</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Digital mockup</span>"&gt;</span>digital mockup<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (DMU) and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Computer-aided_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Computer-aided engineering</span>"&gt;</span>CAE<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> software such as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finite_element_method" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Finite_element_method</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Finite element method</span>"&gt;</span>finite element method analysis<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> or <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Analytic_element_method" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Analytic_element_method</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Analytic element method</span>"&gt;</span>analytic element method<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> allows engineers to create models of designs that can be analyzed without having to make expensive and time-consuming physical prototypes.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="251"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>These allow products and components to be checked for flaws; assess fit and assembly; study ergonomics; and to analyze static and dynamic characteristics of systems such as stresses, temperatures, electromagnetic emissions, electrical currents and voltages, digital logic levels, fluid flows, and kinematics. Access and distribution of all this information is generally organized with the use of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_data_management" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Product_data_management</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Product data management</span>"&gt;</span>product data management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> software.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-76</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-76" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-76</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;76&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="252"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>There are also many tools to support specific engineering tasks such as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer-aided_manufacturing" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Computer-aided_manufacturing</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Computer-aided manufacturing</span>"&gt;</span>computer-aided manufacturing<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (CAM) software to generate <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CNC" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/CNC</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">CNC</span>"&gt;</span>CNC<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> machining instructions; <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manufacturing_process_management" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Manufacturing_process_management</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Manufacturing process management</span>"&gt;</span>manufacturing process management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> software for production engineering; <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic_design_automation" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Electronic_design_automation</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Electronic design automation</span>"&gt;</span>EDA<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> for <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Printed_circuit_board" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Printed_circuit_board</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Printed circuit board</span>"&gt;</span>printed circuit board<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (PCB) and circuit <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schematic" rel="noreferrer electronic engineers; <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maintenance,_repair,_and_operations" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Maintenance,_repair,_and_operations</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Maintenance, repair, and operations</span>"&gt;</span>MRO<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> applications for maintenance management; and Architecture, engineering and construction (AEC) software for civil engineering.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="253"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>In recent years the use of computer software to aid the development of goods has collectively come to be known as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (PLM).<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-77</span>" <span class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="255"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h2&gt;</span><span expressions.<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="258"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The engineering profession engages in a wide range of activities, from large collaboration at the societal level, and also smaller individual projects.  Almost all engineering projects are obligated to some sort of financing agency: a company, a set of investors, or a government.  The few types of engineering that are minimally constrained by such issues are <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pro_bono" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Pro_bono</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Pro bono</span>"&gt;</span>pro bono<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span> engineering and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_design" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Open_design</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Open design</span>"&gt;</span>open-design<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> engineering.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="259"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>By its very nature engineering has interconnections with society, culture and human behavior.  Every product or construction used by modern society is influenced by engineering. The results of engineering activity influence changes to the environment, society and economies, and its application brings with it a responsibility and public safety.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="260"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineering projects can be subject to controversy. Examples from different engineering disciplines include the development of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nuclear_weapon" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Nuclear_weapon</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Nuclear weapon</span>"&gt;</span>nuclear weapons<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Three_Gorges_Dam" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Three_Gorges_Dam</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Three Gorges Dam</span>"&gt;</span>Three Gorges Dam<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, the design and use of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sport_utility_vehicle" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Sport_utility_vehicle</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Sport utility vehicle</span>"&gt;</span>sport utility vehicles<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and the extraction of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuel_oil" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Fuel_oil</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Fuel oil</span>"&gt;</span>oil<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. In response, some western engineering companies have enacted serious <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corporate_social_responsibility" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Corporate_social_responsibility</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Corporate social responsibility</span>"&gt;</span>corporate and social responsibility<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> policies.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="261"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineering is a key driver of innovation and human development. Sub-Saharan Africa, in particular, has a very small engineering capacity which results in many African nations being unable to develop crucial infrastructure without outside aid.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">style</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">white-space:nowrap;</span>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;<span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wikipedia:Citation needed</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">This claim needs references to reliable sources. (March 2013)</span>"&gt;</span>citation needed<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> The attainment of many of the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Millennium_Development_Goals" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Millennium_Development_Goals</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Millennium Development Goals</span>"&gt;</span>Millennium Development Goals<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> requires the achievement of sufficient engineering capacity to develop infrastructure and sustainable technological development.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-MDG_78-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-MDG-78" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-MDG-78</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;78&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="262"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="263"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">thumb tright</span>"&gt;</span><span class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineering companies in many established economies are facing significant challenges with regard to the number of professional engineers being trained, compared with the number retiring.  This problem is very prominent in the UK where engineering has a poor image and low status.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-80</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span this can cause, as well as ethical issues.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-81</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a an "image crisis",<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-82</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a  Much work is needed to avoid huge problems in the UK and other western economies. Still, the UK holds <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" of practice and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Society_of_Professional_Engineers" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/National_Society_of_Professional_Engineers</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">National Society of Professional Engineers</span>"&gt;</span>National Society of Professional Engineers<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> code of ethics states:</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="277"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="278"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;style <span class="html-attribute-name">data-mw-deduplicate</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">TemplateStyles:r996844942</span>"&gt;</span>.mw-parser-output .templatequote{overflow:hidden;margin:1em 0;padding:0 40px}.mw-parser-output .templatequote .templatequotecite{line-height:1.5em;text-align:left;padding-left:1.6em;margin-top:0}<span class="html-tag">&lt;/style&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;blockquote <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">templatequote</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span> Engineering is an important and learned profession. As members of this profession, engineers are expected to exhibit the highest standards of honesty and integrity. Engineering has a direct and vital impact on the quality of life for all people. Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity, and must be dedicated to the protection of the public health, safety, and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that requires adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-83</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span and ethics associated with their profession.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-84</span>" <span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span>Engineers, scientists and technicians at work on target positioner inside <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">National Ignition Facility</span>"&gt;</span>National Ignition Facility<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (NIF) target chamber<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="285"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>There exists an overlap between the sciences and engineering practice; in engineering, one applies science. Both areas of endeavor rely on accurate observation of materials and phenomena.  Both use mathematics and classification criteria to analyze and communicate observations.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">style</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">white-space:nowrap;</span>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;<span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wikipedia:Citation needed</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">This claim needs references to reliable sources. (August 2013)</span>"&gt;</span>citation needed<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="286"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Scientists may also have to complete engineering tasks, such as designing experimental apparatus or building prototypes. Conversely, in the process of developing technology engineers sometimes find themselves exploring new phenomena, thus becoming, for the moment, scientists or more precisely "engineering scientists".<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">style</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">white-space:nowrap;</span>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;<span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wikipedia:Citation needed</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">This claim needs references to reliable sources. (August 2013)</span>"&gt;</span>citation needed<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>&amp;#93;<span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Enlarge</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span>The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" class="html-attribute-value">International Space Station</span>"&gt;</span>International Space Station<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> is used to conduct science experiments of outer space<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span> </td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="289"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>In the book <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/What_Engineers_Know_and_How_They_Know_It" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/What_Engineers_Know_and_How_They_Know_It</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">What Engineers Know and How They Know It</span>"&gt;</span>What Engineers Know and How They Know It<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>,<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-vincenti_88-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-vincenti-88" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-vincenti-88</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;88&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Vincenti" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Walter_Vincenti</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Walter Vincenti</span>"&gt;</span>Walter Vincenti<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> asserts that engineering research has a character different from that of scientific research.  First, it often deals with areas in which the basic <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Physics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Physics</span>"&gt;</span>physics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> or <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemistry" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Chemistry</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Chemistry</span>"&gt;</span>chemistry<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> are well understood, but the problems themselves are too complex to solve in an exact manner.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="290"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>There is a "real and important" difference between engineering and physics as similar to any science field has to do with technology.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-89</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-89" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-89</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;89&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-90</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-90" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-90</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;90&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> Physics is an exploratory science that seeks knowledge of principles while engineering uses knowledge for practical applications of principles. The former equates an understanding into a mathematical principle while the latter measures variables involved and creates technology.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-91</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-91" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-91</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;91&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-92</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-92" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-92</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;92&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-93</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-93" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-93</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;93&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> For technology, physics is an auxiliary and in a way technology is considered as applied physics.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-94</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-94" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-94</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;94&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> Though physics and engineering are interrelated, it does not mean that a physicist is trained to do an engineer's job. A physicist would typically require additional and relevant training.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-95</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-95" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-95</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;95&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> Physicists and engineers engage in different lines of work.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-96</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-96" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-96</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;96&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> But PhD physicists who specialize in sectors of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering_physics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Engineering_physics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Engineering physics</span>"&gt;</span>engineering physics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Applied_physics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Applied_physics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Applied physics</span>"&gt;</span>applied physics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> are titled as Technology officer, R&amp;amp;D Engineers and System Engineers.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-97</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-97" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-97</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;97&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="291"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>An example of this is the use of numerical approximations to the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Navier%E2%80%93Stokes_equations" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Navier%E2%80%93Stokes_equations</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Navier–Stokes equations</span>"&gt;</span>Navier–Stokes equations<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> to describe aerodynamic flow over an aircraft, or the use of the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finite_element_method" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Finite_element_method</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Finite element method</span>"&gt;</span>Finite element method<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> to calculate the stresses in complex components. Second, engineering research employs many semi-<span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Empirical_methods" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Empirical_methods</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Empirical methods</span>"&gt;</span>empirical methods<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> that are foreign to pure scientific research, one example being the method of parameter variation.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">style</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">white-space:nowrap;</span>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;<span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wikipedia:Citation needed</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">This claim needs references to reliable sources. (November 2011)</span>"&gt;</span>citation needed<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="292"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>As stated by Fung <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span>et al.<span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span> in the revision to the classic engineering text <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span>Foundations of Solid Mechanics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span>:</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="293"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="294"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;blockquote&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Engineering is quite different from science. Scientists try to understand nature. Engineers try to make things that do not exist in nature. Engineers stress innovation and invention. To embody an invention the engineer must put his idea in concrete terms, and design something that people can use. That something can be a complex system, device, a gadget, a material, a method, a computing program, an innovative experiment, a new solution to a problem, or an improvement on what already exists. Since a design has to be realistic and functional, it must have its geometry, dimensions, and characteristics data defined.  In the past engineers working on new designs found that they did not have all the required information to make design decisions. Most often, they were limited by insufficient scientific knowledge. Thus they studied <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathematics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Mathematics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Mathematics</span>"&gt;</span>mathematics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Physics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Physics</span>"&gt;</span>physics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemistry" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Chemistry</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Chemistry</span>"&gt;</span>chemistry<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biology" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Biology</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Biology</span>"&gt;</span>biology<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mechanics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Mechanics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Mechanics</span>"&gt;</span>mechanics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. Often they had to add to the sciences relevant to their profession. Thus engineering sciences were born.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Fung_98-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Fung-98" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Fung-98</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;98&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/blockquote&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="295"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Although engineering solutions make use of scientific principles, engineers must also take into account safety, efficiency, economy, reliability, and constructability or ease of fabrication as well as the environment, ethical and legal considerations such as patent infringement or liability in the case of failure of the solution.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-99</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-99" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-99</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;99&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="296"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="297"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Medicine_and_biology</span>"&gt;</span>Medicine and biology<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="299"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The study of the human body, albeit from different directions and for different purposes, is an important common link between medicine and some engineering disciplines. <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medicine" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Medicine</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Medicine</span>"&gt;</span>Medicine<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> aims to sustain, repair, enhance and even The central mouse is <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="302"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Modern medicine can replace several of the body's functions through the use of artificial organs and can significantly alter the function of the human body through artificial devices such as, for example, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brain_implant" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Brain_implant</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Brain implant</span>"&gt;</span>brain implants<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_pacemaker" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Artificial_pacemaker</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Artificial pacemaker</span>"&gt;</span>pacemakers<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Boston_U_100-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Boston_U-100" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Boston_U-100</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;100&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-IEEE_foreign_parts_101-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-IEEE_foreign_parts-101" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-IEEE_foreign_parts-101</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;101&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> The fields of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bionics" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Bionics</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Bionics</span>"&gt;</span>bionics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and medical bionics are dedicated to the study of synthetic implants pertaining to natural systems.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="303"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Conversely, some engineering disciplines view the human body as a biological machine worth studying and are dedicated to emulating many of its functions by replacing <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biology" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Biology</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Biology</span>"&gt;</span>biology<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> with technology. This has led to fields such as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Artificial_intelligence</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Artificial intelligence</span>"&gt;</span>artificial intelligence<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neural_networks" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Neural_networks</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Neural networks</span>"&gt;</span>neural networks<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuzzy_logic" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Fuzzy_logic</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Fuzzy logic</span>"&gt;</span>fuzzy logic<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robot" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Robot</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Robot</span>"&gt;</span>robotics<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.  There are also substantial interdisciplinary interactions between engineering and medicine.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-IME_102-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-IME-102" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-IME-102</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;102&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-IEEE_103-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-IEEE-103" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-IEEE-103</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;103&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="304"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Both fields provide solutions to real world problems. This often requires moving forward before phenomena are completely understood in a more rigorous scientific sense and therefore experimentation and empirical knowledge is an integral part of both.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="305"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Medicine, in part, studies the function of the human body. The human body, as a biological machine, has many functions that can be modeled using engineering methods.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Royal_Academy_104-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Royal_Academy-104" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Royal_Academy-104</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;104&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="306"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The heart for example functions much like a pump,<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Science_Museum_of_Minnesota_105-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Science_Museum_of_Minnesota-105" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Science_Museum_of_Minnesota-105</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;105&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> the skeleton is like a linked structure with levers,<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Minnesota_State_University_emuseum_106-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Minnesota_State_University_emuseum-106" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Minnesota_State_University_emuseum-106</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;106&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> the brain produces <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Signal_(electrical_engineering)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Signal_(electrical_engineering)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Signal (electrical engineering)</span>"&gt;</span>electrical signals<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> etc.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-UC_Berkeley_News_107-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-UC_Berkeley_News-107" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-UC_Berkeley_News-107</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;107&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> These similarities as well as the increasing importance and application of engineering principles in medicine, led to the development of the field of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biomedical_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Biomedical_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Biomedical engineering</span>"&gt;</span>biomedical engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> that uses concepts developed in both disciplines.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="307"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Newly emerging branches of science, such as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Systems_biology" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Systems_biology</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Systems biology</span>"&gt;</span>systems biology<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, are adapting analytical tools traditionally used for engineering, such as systems modeling and computational analysis, to the description of biological systems.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Royal_Academy_104-1</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Royal_Academy-104" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Royal_Academy-104</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;104&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="308"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="309"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span
