noopener">/wiki/Leonardo_da_Vinci</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Leonardo da Vinci</span>"&gt;</span>Leonardo da Vinci<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, seen here in a self-portrait, has been described as the epitome of the artist/engineer.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Bjerklie,_David_108-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Bjerklie,_David-108" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Bjerklie,_David-108</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;108&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> He is also known for his studies on <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_anatomy" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Human_anatomy</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Human anatomy</span>"&gt;</span>human anatomy<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physiology" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Physiology</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Physiology</span>"&gt;</span>physiology<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>.<span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/div&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="311"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>There are connections between engineering and art, for example, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Architecture" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Architecture</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Architecture</span>"&gt;</span>architecture<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Landscape_architecture" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Landscape_architecture</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Landscape architecture</span>"&gt;</span>landscape architecture<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Industrial_design" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Industrial_design</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Industrial design</span>"&gt;</span>industrial design<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> (even to the extent that these disciplines may sometimes be included in a university's <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faculty_(division)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Faculty_(division)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Faculty (division)</span>"&gt;</span>Faculty<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> of Engineering).<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-National_Science_Foundation:The_Art_of_Engineering_109-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-National_Science_Foundation:The_Art_of_Engineering-109" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-National_Science_Foundation:The_Art_of_Engineering-109</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;109&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-MIT_World:The_Art_of_Engineering_110-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-MIT_World:The_Art_of_Engineering-110" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-MIT_World:The_Art_of_Engineering-110</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;110&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-University_of_Texas_at_Dallas_111-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-University_of_Texas_at_Dallas-111" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-University_of_Texas_at_Dallas-111</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;111&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="312"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>The <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Art_Institute_of_Chicago" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Art_Institute_of_Chicago</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Art Institute of Chicago</span>"&gt;</span>Art Institute of Chicago<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, for instance, held an exhibition about the art of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NASA" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/NASA</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">NASA</span>"&gt;</span>NASA<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>'s aerospace design.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-NASA_112-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-NASA-112" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-NASA-112</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;112&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Maillart" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Robert_Maillart</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Robert Maillart</span>"&gt;</span>Robert Maillart<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>'s bridge design is perceived by some to have been deliberately artistic.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Princeton_U_113-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Princeton_U-113" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Princeton_U-113</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;113&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span> At the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_South_Florida" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/University_of_South_Florida</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">University of South Florida</span>"&gt;</span>University of South Florida<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, an engineering professor, through a grant with the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Science_Foundation" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/National_Science_Foundation</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">National Science Foundation</span>"&gt;</span>National Science Foundation<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, has developed a course that connects art and engineering.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-National_Science_Foundation:The_Art_of_Engineering_109-1</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-National_Science_Foundation:The_Art_of_Engineering-109" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-National_Science_Foundation:The_Art_of_Engineering-109</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;109&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Chief_engineer_114-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Chief_engineer-114" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Chief_engineer-114</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;114&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="313"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>Among famous historical figures, <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonardo_da_Vinci" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Leonardo_da_Vinci</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Leonardo da Vinci</span>"&gt;</span>Leonardo da Vinci<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> is a well-known <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Renaissance" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Renaissance</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Renaissance</span>"&gt;</span>Renaissance<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> artist and engineer, and a prime example of the nexus between art and engineering.<span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Bjerklie,_David_108-1</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Bjerklie,_David-108" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Bjerklie,_David-108</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;108&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;sup <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">cite_ref-Drew_U_115-0</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference</span>"&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_note-Drew_U-115" rel="noreferrer noopener">#cite_note-Drew_U-115</a>"&gt;</span>&amp;#91;115&amp;#93;<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/sup&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="314"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="315"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Business</span>"&gt;</span>Business<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="316"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_Engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Business_Engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-redirect</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Business Engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Business Engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> deals with the relationship between professional engineering, IT systems, business administration and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Change_management" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Change_management</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Change management</span>"&gt;</span>change management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>. <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering_management" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Engineering_management</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Engineering management</span>"&gt;</span>Engineering management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> or "Management engineering" is a specialized field of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Management" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Management</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Management</span>"&gt;</span>management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> concerned with engineering practice or the engineering industry sector.  The demand for management-focused engineers (or from the opposite perspective, managers with an understanding of engineering), has resulted in the development of specialized engineering management degrees that develop the knowledge and skills needed for these roles. During an engineering management course, students will develop <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Industrial_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Industrial_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Industrial engineering</span>"&gt;</span>industrial engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> skills, knowledge, and expertise, alongside knowledge of business administration, management techniques, and strategic thinking.  Engineers specializing in change management must have in-depth knowledge of the application of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Industrial_and_organizational_psychology" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Industrial_and_organizational_psychology</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Industrial and organizational psychology</span>"&gt;</span>industrial and organizational psychology<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> principles and methods.  Professional engineers often train as <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Certified_management_consultant" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Certified_management_consultant</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Certified management consultant</span>"&gt;</span>certified management consultants<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> in the very specialized field of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Management_consulting" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Management_consulting</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Management consulting</span>"&gt;</span>management consulting<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> applied to engineering practice or the engineering sector.  This work often deals with large scale complex <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_transformation" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Business_transformation</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Business transformation</span>"&gt;</span>business transformation<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> or <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_process_management" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Business_process_management</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Business process management</span>"&gt;</span>Business process management<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> initiatives in aerospace and defence, automotive, oil and gas, machinery, pharmaceutical, food and beverage, electrical &amp;amp; electronics, power distribution &amp;amp; generation, utilities and transportation systems.  This combination of technical engineering practice, management consulting practice, industry sector knowledge, and change management expertise enables professional engineers who are also qualified as management consultants to lead major business transformation initiatives. These initiatives are typically sponsored by C-level executives.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="317"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/p&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="318"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;h3&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;span <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">mw-headline</span>" <span class="html-attribute-name">id</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Other_fields</span>"&gt;</span>Other fields<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;/h3&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="319"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;p&gt;</span>In <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Political_science" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Political_science</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Political science</span>"&gt;</span>political science<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, the term <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span>engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span> has been borrowed for the study of the subjects of <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_engineering_(political_science)" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Social_engineering_(political_science)</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Social engineering (political science)</span>"&gt;</span>social engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Political_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Political_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Political engineering</span>"&gt;</span>political engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span>, which deal with forming <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Political_structure" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Political_structure</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Political structure</span>"&gt;</span>political<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_structure" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Social_structure</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Social structure</span>"&gt;</span>social structures<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> using engineering methodology coupled with <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Political_science" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Political_science</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Political science</span>"&gt;</span>political science<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> principles. <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marketing_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Marketing_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Marketing engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Marketing engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> and <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Financial_engineering" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Financial_engineering</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Financial engineering</span>"&gt;</span>Financial engineering<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> have similarly borrowed the term.</td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="320"></td><td class="line-content"><span .div-col{margin-top:0.3em;column-width:30em}.mw-parser-output .div-col-small{font-size:90%}.mw-parser-output .div-col-rules{column-rule:1px solid #aaa}.mw-parser-output .div-col dl,.mw-parser-output class="html-tag">&lt;/style&gt;</span><span class="html-tag">&lt;div <span class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">div-col</span>" <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering#cite_ref-30" <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="http://www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/244231/ancient-Greece/261062/Military-technology" rel="noreferrer class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">rel</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">nofollow</span>" <span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> June 6, 2009, at the <span class="html-tag">&lt;a <span class="html-attribute-name">href</span>="<a class="html-attribute-value html-external-link" target="_blank" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wayback_Machine" rel="noreferrer noopener">/wiki/Wayback_Machine</a>" <span class="html-attribute-name">title</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">Wayback Machine</span>"&gt;</span>Wayback Machine<span class="html-tag">&lt;/a&gt;</span> Quote: "The 7th century, by contrast, had witnessed rapid innovations, such as the introduction of the hoplite and the trireme, which still were the basic instruments of war in the 5th." and "But it was the development of artillery that opened an epoch, and this invention did not predate the 4th century. It was first heard of in the context of Sicilian warfare against Carthage in the time of Dionysius I of Syracuse."<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" class="html-attribute-name">class</span>="<span class="html-attribute-value">reference-text</span>"&gt;</span>Bjerklie, David.  "The Art of Renaissance Engineering."  <span class="html-tag">&lt;i&gt;</span>MIT's Technology Review<span class="html-tag">&lt;/i&gt;</span> Jan./Feb.1998: 54–59.  Article explores the concept of the "artist-engineer", an individual who used his artistic talent in engineering. Quote from article: Da Vinci reached the pinnacle of "artist-engineer"-dom, Quote2: "It was Leonardo da Vinci who initiated the most ambitious expansion in the role of artist-engineer, progressing from astute observer to inventor to theoretician." (Bjerklie 58)<span class="html-tag">&lt;/span&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td class="line-number" value="593"></td><td class="line-content"><span class="html-tag">&lt;/li&gt;</span></td></tr><tr><td
